xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/604786-As Long As There's Alcohol 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3e8gfZEEgto1ykzec4NuhKnMRZi.jpg The invisible side of modern Italy where fear, loneliness and crime prevail. Following an inner impulse and searching for this dark Italy, Michalis, the main character, one rainy morning will arrive in Milan and wander the city with nostalgia. Every corner, every building, every street is an occasion for the memory to run in the old days. A chance acquaintance will lead him to the outskirts of the city to a giant residential complex that everyone calls "Nightmare". As Long As There's Alcohol
